sense.name: a physiological state of illness
sense.examples: Smallpox is a communicable disease. Disease and poverty contribute to the low life expectancy in this country. It's a degenerative disease of the central nervous system. The plants showed evidence of disease on their stems and leaves.

sense.name: a dysfunctional cultural practice or behavior
sense.examples: Redundancy is one of the diseases of bureaucracies. The disease of anti-Semitism spread across europe under the nazis. He described the practice of back-dating stock options as a new disease of corporate America.
